name: HL2: Deathmatch 2D
description:
I Highly recommend that you download the game instead of playing it on
browser. The HTML version has some wierd audio bugs and lack some options
that the downloadable version has.

A little project I made to practice in CTF2.5

Highly inspired by: https://acorndev.itch.io/half-life-deathmatch-2d
You could even think of this game as a Singleplayer version of that game.

This game doesn't have Multiplayer, only Singleplayer with bots.

If you want multiplayer go play the game that inspired this one.

Here's a fun fact:
I made this game after I bought the full version of CTF2.5.
But I made a backup of the project and opened it with the free version.
It ran near-perfectly(the movement was a little wierd).

This means that if I was good enough back then, I could have made this game.
I think this is a good example of how much I've learned.
